constructor.details: Constructor sets the token address and owner

params._tokenAddress: The address of the 777 token contract

depositTokens(uint256).details: Allow the owner to deposit tokens to the faucet

params.amount: The amount of tokens to deposit

fundWithEth().details: Allow the owner to fund the contract with ETH

returns._0: The address of the current token contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requestFunds().details: Request ETH and tokens from the faucet

requestFundsFor(address).details: Request funds for a specific address (can only be called by authorized relayers)

params.recipient: The address to receive the funds

params._cooldownPeriod: The new cooldown period in seconds

setRelayerStatus(address,bool).details: Add or remove an authorized relayer

setTokenAddress(address).details: Update the token address (allows changing to a different ERC20 token)

setTokenAmount(uint256).details: Update the token amount to be dispensed

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawEth(uint256).details: Allow the owner to withdraw ETH in case of emergency

params.amount: The amount of ETH to withdraw
